actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to authorize voluntary withholding of Maryland and Virginia income taxes in the case of officers and employees of the Architect of the Capitol.

summary.text: Authorizes the Architect of the Capitol to enter into agreements with the State of Maryland and the State of Virginia for the voluntary withholding of Maryland and Virginia income taxes in the case of officers and employees of the Architect of the Capitol.

titles.title: A bill to authorize voluntary withholding of Maryland and Virginia income taxes in the case of officers and employees of the Architect of the Capitol.
